document.full_text: a philippine man was arrested and charged with illegally selling an unmanned u.s. spy plane known as the raven, the u.s. attorney's office in tampa said on monday.
document.title: man accused of selling u.s. spy plane on ebay
lines_and_colors: a philippine man was arrested and charged with illegally selling an unmanned u.s. spy plane known as the raven, the u.s. attorney's office in tampa said on monday.
